page.title: 04THE A 47
page.content: The A 47 is the main road running through the area. It links Norwich to Great Yarmouth and is a very busy road. Three types of traffic make it particularly busy: 1) Commuter Traffic. Many people use this road in their cars to go to work in Norwich, making it busy in the morning and early evening. 2) Lorries going to the port of Great Yarmouth. This includes the juggernauts belonging to the Norfolk Line and going to the Netherlands, and lorries carrying goods for the Natural Gas Rigs in the North Sea. 3) Holiday Traffic. In the summer the road is busy with cars, caravans and coaches with people going to the resorts on the Norfolk coast, especially Great Yarmouth, and for holidays on the Norfolk Broads.
